backend/main.mo: Actor defining authorization mixins, storage, and multiple data types with mutable maps for users, products, orders, media, and other site content.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report specifying a frontend change in Hero.tsx and associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and design details of all major frontend components.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling identity, payment status routing, profile setup, and rendering all site sections.
frontend/src/components/Biography.tsx: Biography section fetching bio data and rendering a styled portrait, animated background, and descriptive content.
frontend/src/components/Booking.tsx: Booking page checking membership access, showing consulting rate, and providing login or membership prompts with styled UI.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Shopping cart drawer component handling item display, cart clearing, and Stripe checkout session creation.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact information fetched from the backend with styled phone, email, and location sections.
frontend/src/components/Credentials.tsx: Renders a credentials section with diploma and portrait images in a styled layout.
frontend/src/components/DnsStatusChecker: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying detailed professional credentials and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed header with navigation links, scroll handling, mobile menu, and Internet Identity login/logout.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Interactive hero section with parallax background layers and mouseâ€‘tracking visual effects.
frontend/src/components/Media.tsx: Displays the training videos section, checks user access, and shows locked content prompts with login and membership options.
frontend/src/components/Membership.tsx: Shows membership plans, user membership status, and handles PayPal-based subscription actions.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Renders a payment cancellation screen with options to return home or retry navigating to membership.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Displays a successful payment confirmation, refreshes membership data, and offers navigation to content or home.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name, email, and phone fields, saving data via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/Publications.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of publications with Amazon links and provides a PayPal payment portal link.
frontend/src/components/Store.tsx: Displays a list of hardcoded apparel items with order links and QR codes inside a styled section.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for submitting and saving Stripe secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/SupportDonations: Renders donation options with Venmo and Cash App cards including QR images and links.
frontend/src/components/TrainingVideos.t: Fetches and displays training videos and documents with loading states and external watch links.
frontend/src/components/VideoModal.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile data, content, access flags, and various backend resources via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind layers, color variables, dark mode values, and custom utility classes for visual effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetUrl.ts: Provides a helper that URL-encodes filename segments and returns a safe /assets/ URL path.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and modifying hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, versions, and feature requests related to frontend whitespace and audio player adjustments.
